sources.description:
MASCOT 12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Frankie Darro, Rin Tin Tin Jr., George J. Lewis, Boots Mallory
Directors: Colbert Clark, Harry L. Fraser
Frank Courtney stands to inherit a vast fortune‚Äîbut his treacherous guardian, Norman Bryan, has deadly plans to seize it for himself. As danger closes in, Frank‚Äôs only hope lies with his fearless wolf-dog and his trusted ally, radio operator Bob Whitlock. Together, they‚Äôll face sabotage, betrayal, and relentless pursuit in a desperate fight to protect Frank‚Äôs legacy!
 üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:07     CHAPTER 1:  The Call of the Wilderness
30:33     CHAPTER 2:  The Shadow of a Crime
48:55     CHAPTER 3:  The Fugitive
1:00:22  CHAPTER 4:  A Dead Man's Hand
1:15:54  CHAPTER 5:  Wolf Pack Law
1:31:11  CHAPTER 6:  The Gates of Mercy
1:46:50  CHAPTER 7:  The Empty Room
2:01:54  CHAPTER 8:  Avenging Fangs
2:15:14  CHAPTER 9:  Wizard of the Wireless
2:28:19  CHAPTER 10: Accused!
2:41:50  CHAPTER 11: The Broken Record
2:57:10 CHAPTER 12: Danger Lights
3:12:24  Please Subscribe!

Unleash the action-packed thrills of this classic 12-chapter cliffhanger serial from Mascot Pictures, directed by Colbert Clark and Harry L. Fraser. This fast-paced 1933 adventure stars Frankie Darro as young hero Jimmy Carter, who finds himself caught in a deadly conspiracy involving a powerful radio invention and ruthless criminals. Featuring the unforgettable Rin Tin Tin Jr. as the courageous canine companion, this serial delivers nonstop suspense, daring rescues, and vintage action at its best.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

With a stellar supporting cast including George J. Lewis, Henry B. Walthall, and boots-and-fists action from stars like Yakima Canutt and Heinie Conklin, this serial is a must-watch for fans of early Hollywood storytelling and animal heroes. Produced during the golden age of serials, this Mascot Pictures production offers authentic 1930s pulp entertainment, full of betrayal, loyalty, and high-stakes drama.

Whether you're a film history buff or a lover of old-school adventure, this restored serial is a gem from the early years of the sound era. Don't forget to like, subscribe, and hit the bell for more vintage film uploads and classic serial content!

Perfect for fans of Golden Age cliffhanger serials, black-and-white action thrillers, and vintage Republic Pictures productions, this complete serial is ideal for viewers who love classic movie heroes, mad villains, and pulse-pounding storytelling. Whether you‚Äôre a lifelong Bela Lugosi fan, a Ralph Byrd enthusiast, or a nostalgic serial binge-watcher, this fully restored presentation is a must-watch. Rediscover one of the greatest chapter plays of the 1930s and experience old-school Hollywood thrills like never before.

Be sure to like, comment, and subscribe for more classic serials, vintage movie marathons, and rare cinematic treasures‚Äîonly on PizzaFLIX and beyond!

metadata.Plot: Frank Courtney is the heir to great wealth, but his guardian Norman Bryan secretly plots to do the boy in and steal the inheritance. Only Frank's friend, radio operator Bob Whitlock, and Frank's wolf-dog stand between him and disaster.
metadata.Writer: Barney A. Sarecky, Sherman L. Lowe, Al Martin
metadata.Actors: Rin Tin Tin Jr., Frankie Darro, Boots Mallory
